author: jkuhnert
msg: tapestry.widget.Widget recently had a new parameter added that specified whether or not to destroy the widget
in question as part of the sync. The form based widget components weren't using this new logic and so
were incorrectly destroying themselves when they really shouldn't be.

author: jmarino
msg: continued refactoring to make exceptions consistent; make component-related exceptions that need to be handled checked; make TargetException abstract and introduce stronger exception typing through subclasses

author: jdonnerstag
msg: fixed junit tests which failed due to someone changing markupId implementation without updating the tests.
